about_the_game:
A pixel art point-and-click RPG where you explore a medieval fantasy world and have relationships with beautiful virgin girls with mature bodies.

You play the role of a young man summoned by the SEX MAIDEN to Impregnate the whole town, fight the EVIL MAIDEN, bring her to the knees, and become the new King!

GAMEPLAY
Encounter a variety of young maidens in the medieval town, each engaged in different trades, and offer assistance with their endeavors. There are multiple ways to raise a relationship with girls, play them a song, gift something, Spend time with them, or challenge them for a minigame!


Manage your days and time during the weekdays and access additional events on weekends.

LOVE & SLAVE ROUTE - Multiple endings, choices may lead a girl to end up a prostitute or she may have a happy love life with you. Easily track your progress with girls, take them on a date with you at their favorite location, bring them home, sleep with them, and make them meet other girls for possible threesome events!

BATTLE SYSTEM
A simple turn-based battle system with a slight twist, the Souls of the enemies you defeat can be captured and used to fight, level up, and evolve and can be reincarnated.


PREGNANCY
This doesn't end here, after pregnancy you can raise your cute daughters, and spend time with them! With the help of X-ray Special Skill you can check if someone is pregnant.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains several depictions of explicit sexual acts, some minor drug use(potions).

A pixel art point-and-click RPG where you explore a medieval fantasy world and have relationships with beautiful virgin girls with mature bodies.

You play the role of a young man summoned by the SEX MAIDEN to Impregnate the whole town, fight the EVIL MAIDEN, bring her to the knees, and become the new King!

Encounter a variety of young maidens in the medieval town, each engaged in different trades, and offer assistance with their endeavors. There are multiple ways to raise a relationship with girls, play them a song, gift something, Spend time with them, or challenge them for a minigame!


Manage your days and time during the weekdays and access additional events on weekends.

LOVE & SLAVE ROUTE - Multiple endings, choices may lead a girl to end up a prostitute or she may have a happy love life with you. Easily track your progress with girls, take them on a date with you at their favorite location, bring them home, sleep with them, and make them meet other girls for possible threesome events!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Isekai Awakening

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Turn off other apps before running the game, If facing lag when loading map or game crashing.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A pixel art point-and-click RPG where you explore a medieval fantasy world and have relationships with beautiful girls.
